storyInfo:
W leads a team to intercept a group of defecting mercenaries. Flamebringer breaks through the conflict and leaves Reunion behind him.
At Rhodes Island, Flamebringer will meet another old friend...

attributes.content: W, we're in trouble here.
attributes.name: Reunion Caster

attributes.content: Ooh... Must be something fun for you to contact me on this channel. What's up?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Not that much fun, W. While you were sorting out that Sarkaz mercenary, one of our teams deserted.
attributes.name: Reunion Caster

attributes.content: They looked like some kind of battlefield mop up logistics team, so we got after them right away.
attributes.name: Reunion Caster

attributes.content: They scattered as soon as we made contact, making for the city limits.
attributes.name: Reunion Caster

attributes.content: Sounds like somebody earned a cookie.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: There's more... The squad we sent after them fell off the grid too. We haven't been able to make contact.
attributes.name: Reunion Caster

attributes.content: I thought maybe you'd know what happened, since you're leading the mercenaries now.
attributes.name: Reunion Caster

attributes.content: How does a squad suddenly vanish?
attributes.name: Reunion Caster

attributes.content: 01:13 P.M. \ Clear
Chernobog - Outskirts - Wilderness
Am I supposed to understand this?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: It is what it is. Other teams report no sign of any enemy ambush or trap. We only know they were facing a Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Reunion Caster

attributes.content: Of course they're Sarkaz. It's not like I've got any other mercs. But anyway, this is a good story. Keep going.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: At first contact, we managed to suppress the target. Playing it safe, we held back our squads. The enemy did not appear particularly strong.
attributes.name: Reunion Caster

attributes.content: Then, suddenly, all communications ceased.
attributes.name: Reunion Caster

attributes.content: ...Yeah, you guys tip your hand pretty easily. A real predator knows not to bare his fangs too soon.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: What should we do?
attributes.name: Reunion Caster

attributes.content: Well what's so special about those Sarkaz?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: ...I'm not sure. We lost contact with the eyewitnesses. But from a distance, all we know is they have a close quarters fighter who really likes to get up in there.
attributes.name: Reunion Caster

attributes.content: Then I need you to avoid direct contact with them. Stall that one, I'll be there in a bit.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Something the matter?
attributes.name: Reunion Blademaster

attributes.content: Nothing. Just a little baby squad that made good bait.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Should we move to support them?
attributes.name: Reunion Blademaster

attributes.content: C'mon, everyone's got a job to do. Why can't we just let everybody handle their own thing?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Yeah... Let's not think too hard about this one. I do care so much about the Sarkaz weirdos my poor predecessor brought along.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Understood.
attributes.name: Reunion Blademaster

attributes.content: Inform all squads: prepare for battle, move to the outskirts of the city.
attributes.name: Reunion Blademaster

attributes.content: Agh, damn it! This bastard's moving even faster! Is he still hiding his true power?!
attributes.name: Reunion Caster

attributes.content: ...Pathetic. Is this the best your Reunion Movement has to offer?
This cocky...! He's making fun of us——
attributes.name: Reunion Caster

attributes.content: Heh...
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I knew I'd run into some old friends here, but I never thought I'd see you.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: W, we——
attributes.name: Reunion Caster

attributes.content: Go home, before you get killed. Don't give me that look like you wanna get even. He's not even using a fraction of his full power. But hey, if you wanna die that bad, I guess I won't get in your way?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: ...fall back.
attributes.name: Reunion Caster

attributes.content: It's been a while, wandering swordmaster.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: You——
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: They call me W now.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: How about you?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Flamebringer. Surely you know what it means to exchange names with me.
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: Oooh, spooky. So you traded business cards with all those dudes you sliced up before?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Commissions and combat are not the same.
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: A Sarkaz like you, having been through a battle like that, suddenly up and vanishing, it makes a girl worry.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: And a mercenary running off just because he's got a new leader? That's a little wobbly, isn't it?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: That is utterly insignificant.
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: Though I never imagined your subordinates would be so unworthy, unfit to even hear my name.
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: Then I guess I should be honored... Oh, but those men weren't under me very long. Ah, are you inviting me to kill you?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: No, I have no interest in your petty fighting style. It relies so much on outside forces.
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: But I have to admit, tactics are a kind of skill. Then if your tactics are more elegant than they used to be, I am willing to taste them.
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: ...That's weird. Weren't you one of those 'as long as the target dies, anything goes' types?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: W, the squad has fallen back to the target location and successfully cut off the enemy retreat. They have nowhere to go.
attributes.name: Reunion Blademaster

attributes.content: And I never expected you would be leading this band of mooks. We've all changed a lot.
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: Mooks? Oh... you mean Reunion?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Or do you mean... the Sarkaz?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Gah——!
attributes.name: Reunion Blademaster

attributes.content: Hmph.
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: I won't underestimate you, Sarkaz, I've been watching you.
attributes.name: Reunion Blademaster

attributes.content: Too bad. You're out of options.
attributes.name: Reunion Blademaster

attributes.content: Is that how it is? I guess you are too.
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: Isn't this much more fun? Now you're my whetstone. And my blade is a bit dull.
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: Really? You're still talking big?
attributes.name: Reunion Blademaster

attributes.content: Right. Come on.
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: Agh! Shit! How are you——
attributes.name: Reunion Blademaster

attributes.content: Gaaaah——!
attributes.name: Reunion Blademaster

attributes.content: You're still talking?
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: ...He's even stronger. Not that I'm surprised.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: W! Why are we just standing here watching?! Just give the order and we'll turn him to dust!
attributes.name: Reunion Caster

attributes.content: So now I get to boss you around again?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Now's not the time for this!
attributes.name: Reunion Caster

attributes.content: But I'm really not your commander.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Here's an idea. Back up, don't provoke him, and pick another time to get yourself killed.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: ...Damn it.
attributes.name: Reunion Blademaster

attributes.content: Right? You really thought you were gonna step up and pick a fight with him? Is this open mic night?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Tsk...
attributes.name: Reunion Blademaster

attributes.content: Who's next?
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: Where's the fire? You got somewhere to be?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: This isn't the first time I've been surrounded.
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: Right right. Let's see, are you talking about that civil war? Sounds like a good story. Tell it for us?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: What's to tell? They ambushed me. They're all dead. I'm still alive. That's the story.
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: What do you think? Should I keep going?
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: That fight just now was nothing for me. I need so much more.
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: No... I'm just thinking like, why don't you join us?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: W?! He's a traitor. Look how many of us he's killed——
attributes.name: Reunion Caster

attributes.content: It was my mercenaries who decided to use him. He'd be good for Reunion. Got a problem?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Yes!
attributes.name: Reunion Caster

attributes.content: I mean, think about it. We have so much more fun over here! War, bloodshed, and all those Sarkaz buddies...
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Everything you're looking for, we got here on a silver platter.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I'm speaking to you from the heart here. We have so much in common, you and I.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I don't think so.
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: You're Infected, right? You'd fit right in with Reunion! What's the problem?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Wanton destruction, organized savagery, I fail to see what I could get from a group like this.
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: You call this war? This is just the strike of a match flaming out. You should know what a real war looks like.
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: Don't talk like that. We've got serious, hardworking folks here too. Lots of diversity in Reunion.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Like, my old boss was kind of a purist, but I'm the type who finds joy in everything.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: If I could make a request... Then I would like to taste Talulah's swordsmanship.
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: The dragon lady? I mean, I don't wanna talk her up too much, but you don't have a snowball's chance in hell of beating her.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: And like, could we even call her thing swordsmanship? You'd be a pile of dust before you even got close to her.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I know.
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: Of course, I also know that if I refuse you, the odds of me escaping this city alive are just as small.
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: So what have I got to lose? If I don't push myself to break the chains of complacency, how can I ever improve?
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: Huh... when did you become so sentimental?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I seek only the meaning of life.
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: Right. Whatever you say, buddy. Let's set the dragon lady aside for a second, what do you think of running with the mercenary team?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: You're used to the work. You get to do pretty much whatever you want. And the commander you hate is already dead.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: You can't be trusted. Both of us have so much to hide.
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: ...Heh. I know a better place. One much more suited to sharpening my blade than Reunion.
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: I saw it. Not long ago. Where you and that Sarkaz had your little transaction. That battle got my blood pumping.
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: There's always something.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: You took him out in the end, but facts are facts. You can't cover this up.
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: Hmph.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Alright, alright! You win. We made a verbal contract, he'd get rid of the boss, grease the wheels a bit for me.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: We're all friends here. Let's not stand on ceremony.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: But you won't let them go.
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: I can at least leave the people they want to protect.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: We agreed a Rhodes Island rescue team could come help. Me killing him didn't break that deal, did it?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I've got my principles. I don't mind cutting some slack here and there. But when I got a toy right here in my hands? How am I not supposed to play with it?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: And you let him take down so many of your elite fighters. They're not easily replaced.
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: Yeah, yeah! I'm still pissed off about that!
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Ugh. Here I thought I was gonna get back together with an old friend, catch up, make nice. But you're impossible! I'm positively heartbroken!
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: ...W, we need to get moving. Dragging this out too long will throw everything off schedule.
attributes.name: Reunion Blademaster

attributes.content: Fine. Looks like we're out of time here... You're really not gonna change your mind?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Of course not.
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: Last question: who are you working for now? Oh, there's no way you're gonna answer that,  is there?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: And I think I can guess anyway.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Really? Here I thought they weren't so famous.
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: I've got a lot of friends in the neighborhood. You know, I've got friends just about everywhere. You're one of 'em.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: That last bit disproves the first bit.
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: Nah. What I'm saying is I might have an idea of how your old mercenary team got wiped out.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: The honored captain of your swordmasters behind the plot that turned you into the man you are today, may very well be in the place you intend to go?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Is that right...?
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: Is it...
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: Fascinating.
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: Ahahaha! So you didn't even know! I mean, I only just found out myself.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: You'll figure it out soon enough. Things aren't as simple as you think.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I'm really looking forward to seeing what you do. Hehe. What ever will you do?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: W! What are you waiting for?!
attributes.name: Reunion Caster

attributes.content: Okay, listen, my Sarkaz aren't going to do anything? Whatever needs doing, you guys do it yourselves.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Swordmaster——Er, Flamebringer, you might die in this battle we're about to have.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: It's been a long time since I've been in a position like this. I'm excited.
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: Long time? Maybe getting your whole team wiped out didn't turn you as icy cold as they say. Looks like you're all cheered up?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: That's one way we're different, W. Happiness isn't a goal worth chasing.
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: I lost so much 'last time,' but now the path before me is crystal clear.
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: This time, I hope you won't disappoint me.
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: Look at that big smile.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: If I said I'd let you live, would you believe me?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Funny, I was going to ask you the same question.
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: According to the contract, there is no requirement that you engage in open hostilities with Reunion prior to your onboarding.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: At my request.
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: We welcome Infected and those ambitious enough to pursue solutions to the Oripathy crisis, but we reject those who violate rules and regulations.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Considering our lack of information surrounding the specific circumstances of that incident, it has not factored into our decision.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: But this will not happen again.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Should anything happen, we can deal with it your way.
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: We have already dealt with it. Your goals and motivations have also not factored into our decision.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: If we determine you are inadmissable into Rhodes Island, then no matter how upstanding you may be, we cannot make an exception.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Right. It's just a personal request.
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: Hmph. No matter. Welcome aboard.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Listen, your actions from here on reflect on the operators beside you, and they will be making decisions based on your actions.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: As long as you abide by our regulations, Rhodes Island welcomes you as one of our own, regardless of your past.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Conversely, Operator Flamebringer, should you step even one pinky toe out of line...
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Right.
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: Now then, let's go to Medical. There's someone who'd like to see you.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: You...
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: ...Heh.
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: So that's how it is.
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: I never should've doubted you, W...
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: Turns out living a bit longer does have its perks.
attributes.name: Flamebringer
